entry.title: Sharing block templates
entry.summary: The discussion includes a reference to Stratum's infrastructure, highlighting the availability of template timing data points which are relevant to the ongoing conversation. Specifically, this information can be found on their website, accessible through the provided [link](https://stratum.work). This inclusion suggests that the data available at Stratum could offer valuable insights or benchmarks for those interested in understanding or comparing infrastructure performance and timing metrics. The mention indicates an opportunity for readers or participants in the discussion to explore these data points further as part of their research or analysis in the related field.
